verses.text: Moreover the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,

Now, thou son of man , wilt thou judge , wilt thou judge the bloody city ? yea, thou shalt shew her all her abominations.\f + \fr 22.2 \ft judge: or, plead for\f*\f + \fr 22.2 \ft bloody…: Heb. city of bloods?\f*\f + \fr 22.2 \ft shew her: Heb. make her know\f*
Then say thou, Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, The city sheddeth blood in the midst of it, that her time may come , and maketh idols against herself to defile herself.

Thou art become guilty in thy blood that thou hast shed ; and hast defiled thyself in thine idols which thou hast made ; and thou hast caused thy days to draw near , and art come \add even\add* unto thy years : therefore have I made thee a reproach unto the heathen , and a mocking to all countries.

\add Those that be\add* near , and \add those that be\add* far from thee, shall mock thee, \add which art\add* infamous \add and\add* much vexed.\f + \fr 22.5 \ft infamous…: Heb. polluted of name, much in vexation\f*
Behold, the princes of Israel , every one were in thee to their power to shed blood.\f + \fr 22.6 \ft power: Heb. arm\f*

In thee have they set light by father and mother : in the midst of thee have they dealt by oppression with the stranger : in thee have they vexed the fatherless and the widow.\f + \fr 22.7 \ft oppression: or, deceit\f*
Thou hast despised mine holy things , and hast profaned my sabbaths.
In thee are men that carry tales to shed blood : and in thee they eat upon the mountains : in the midst of thee they commit lewdness.\f + \fr 22.9 \ft that…: Heb. of slanders\f*
In thee have they discovered their fathers’ nakedness : in thee have they humbled her that was set apart for pollution.

And one hath committed abomination with his neighbour’s wife ; and another hath lewdly defiled his daughter in law ; and another in thee hath humbled his sister , his father’s daughter.\f + \fr 22.11 \ft one: or, every one\f*\f + \fr 22.11 \ft another: or, every one\f*\f + \fr 22.11 \ft lewdly: or, by lewdness\f*

In thee have they taken gifts to shed blood ; thou hast taken usury and increase , and thou hast greedily gained of thy neighbours by extortion , and hast forgotten me, saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*. \p
¶ Behold, therefore I have smitten mine hand at thy dishonest gain which thou hast made , and at thy blood which hath been in the midst of thee.
Can thine heart endure , or can thine hands be strong , in the days that I shall deal with thee? I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have spoken \add it\add*, and will do \add it\add*.
And I will scatter thee among the heathen , and disperse thee in the countries , and will consume thy filthiness out of thee.

And thou shalt take thine inheritance in thyself in the sight of the heathen , and thou shalt know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 22.16 \ft shalt take…: or, shalt be profaned\f* \p
And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,

Son of man , the house of Israel is to me become dross : all they \add are\add* brass , and tin , and iron , and lead , in the midst of the furnace ; they are \add even\add* the dross of silver.\f + \fr 22.18 \ft dross of silver: Heb. drosses, etc\f*
Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because ye are all become dross , behold, therefore I will gather you into the midst of Jerusalem.

\add As\add* they gather silver , and brass , and iron , and lead , and tin , into the midst of the furnace , to blow the fire upon it, to melt \add it;\add* so will I gather \add you\add* in mine anger and in my fury , and I will leave \add you there\add*, and melt you.\f + \fr 22.20 \ft As…: Heb. According to the gathering\f*
Yea, I will gather you, and blow upon you in the fire of my wrath , and ye shall be melted in the midst thereof.
As silver is melted in the midst of the furnace , so shall ye be melted in the midst thereof; and ye shall know that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have poured out my fury upon you. \p
¶ And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , say unto her, Thou \add art\add* the land that is not cleansed , nor rained upon in the day of indignation.

\add There is\add* a conspiracy of her prophets in the midst thereof, like a roaring lion ravening the prey ; they have devoured souls ; they have taken the treasure and precious things ; they have made her many widows in the midst thereof.

Her priests have violated my law , and have profaned mine holy things : they have put no difference between the holy and profane , neither have they shewed \add difference\add* between the unclean and the clean , and have hid their eyes from my sabbaths , and I am profaned among them.\f + \fr 22.26 \ft violated: Heb. offered violence to\f*
Her princes in the midst thereof \add are\add* like wolves ravening the prey , to shed blood , \add and\add* to destroy souls , to get dishonest gain.

And her prophets have daubed them with untempered \add morter\add*, seeing vanity , and divining lies unto them, saying , Thus saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*, when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath not spoken.

The people of the land have used oppression , and exercised robbery , and have vexed the poor and needy : yea, they have oppressed the stranger wrongfully.\f + \fr 22.29 \ft oppression: or, deceit\f*\f + \fr 22.29 \ft wrongfully: Heb. without right\f*
And I sought for a man among them, that should make up the hedge , and stand in the gap before me for the land , that I should not destroy it: but I found none.

Therefore have I poured out mine indignation upon them; I have consumed them with the fire of my wrath : their own way have I recompensed upon their heads , saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
